page.title: 07F/L. QUESTIONAIRE CONTINUED.
page.content: {Leisure activities.}The major sports all figured prominently i.e.cricket,rugby,football,tennis,fish ing,squash and badminton.Animals also play an important part in peoples lives i.e.dogs,and horses.Womens Institute,brownies,scouts and guides,and Duke of Edinbrough award scheme also loom large. {Area of Workplace.}A small number actually worked in the "D Block",and those were almost entirely connected with the land. The vast majority worked in Kineton,Wellesbourne ,or more likely Stratford. Royal Leamington Spa or Banbury.Even the children had to travel outside the area for their education,mainly to Kineton,but also to Stratford. {How long have you lived in the area?} Longtime residents and recent arrivals almost balance eachother.
